name: Introduction
text:
Once upon a time in a land far away. Under a purple sun, on a globe of orange clay.

In this land, stories always change. Choose you own path and the tale will never be the same.

This story though is always about family.

0.currentQuestion: Is it a big or a small thing?
0.text:
A family of Scaries walking this way,
The run, the laugh, they hug, they play.

A big one and a small one, they stroll hand in hand.
Just like you and me, big hand and small hand.

The small one is Itty Bitty,
with her diaper and crazy hair.

The big one is Big Scary,
with his lopsided horns and his jovial smile.

The stroll through the orange woods,
looking for mama.

She is out there somewhere,
and they must find her.

Lil and Big see something further down the path.

optionRight.currentQuestion: Is it a friend or is it a foe? What should Big Scary and Lil Scary do?
optionRight.text:
That thing is so big and so fierce looking. Those teeth are so fangy!
Those eyes are so scary, that smell is so stinky!
optionRight.name: Big Thing
Big Friend
optionRight.text:
Hi! How are you! We are two monsters,
Big and small. A papa and baby,
What is your name, you who are so very tall?

My name is Twerp, and I am going to work.
I take care of Queen Power Face's squid birds and air whales.
I sure am hungry.
optionRight.buttonLeft: Keep your gum berries, Twerp probably eats only meat! Run!
optionRight.buttonRight: Share your gum berries with Twerp, he seems hungry.
